Pretty good pretty good. The old guy is finally not some creepy demonic looking nightmare. He's designed pretty normally and is a pretty chill guy. I like the story of it, bunch of horny girls looking to fuck even if it's an old guy. The art style and details in this are real good. I especially love the facial features. Character design is good good nice and fleshed out with different personalities. 9/10 kind of has some plot holes to it in my opinion.

I 3000% support this. Hard working elder landlord treats his clients with respect and fulfills all of their needs 😇😇.
A small twist to the usual harem formula but a welcome one. All they need now is a chad to move in and try to take advantage of the girls and landlord sets him straight, maybe showing chad some tough love to help him in his own life to. Really a spiritual successor to mr. Enkou hentai series
